words.meaning: To recognize and name someone or something
words.example: The witness was able to identify the suspect.

chinese.example: 證人能夠識別嫌疑人。

words.meaning: To set on fire or to start burning
words.example: The spark ignited the gasoline.

chinese.example: 火花點燃了汽油。

words.meaning: To refuse to take notice of or acknowledge
words.example: She ignored the warning signs.

chinese.example: 她忽視了警告標誌。

words.meaning: To explain or make something clear by using examples
words.example: The teacher illustrated the concept with diagrams.

chinese.example: 老師用圖表說明了這個概念。

words.meaning: To form a mental image or concept of something
words.example: Try to imagine a world without war.

chinese.example: 試著想像一個沒有戰爭的世界。

words.meaning: To copy the behavior or actions of someone
words.example: Children often imitate their parents.

chinese.example: 孩子們經常模仿父母。

words.meaning: To make someone immune to a disease
words.example: Children are immunized against measles.

chinese.example: 兒童接種疫苗以免疫麻疹。

words.meaning: To put a decision or plan into effect
words.example: The school implemented a new grading system.

chinese.example: 學校實施了一個新的評分系統。

words.meaning: To suggest something without stating it directly
words.example: His words implied a lack of trust.

chinese.example: 他的話暗示著缺乏信任。

words.meaning: To bring goods or data into a place or system
words.example: The country imports oil from overseas.

chinese.example: 這個國家從海外進口石油。

words.meaning: To force something to be accepted or put in place
words.example: The government imposed new regulations.

chinese.example: 政府強加了新規定。

words.meaning: To make someone feel admiration and respect
words.example: She impressed the judges with her performance.

chinese.example: 她的表演給評委留下了深刻印象。

words.meaning: To make something better
words.example: He improved his writing after taking the course.

chinese.example: 上課後，他的寫作有所改善。

words.meaning: To make someone or something part of a group or set
words.example: The price includes breakfast.

chinese.example: 價格包括早餐。

words.meaning: To include or integrate a part into a whole
words.example: The curriculum incorporates new learning technologies.

chinese.example: 課程納入了新的學習技術。

words.meaning: To become or make greater in size, amount, or degree
words.example: The company increased its profits last year.

chinese.example: 公司去年增加了利潤。

words.meaning: To show or point out
words.example: The results indicate a need for further study.

chinese.example: 結果表明需要進一步研究。

words.meaning: To cause or bring about
words.example: The drug may induce sleepiness.

chinese.example: 這種藥可能引起困倦。

words.meaning: To have an effect on someone or something
words.example: Parents can greatly influence their children’s values.

chinese.example: 父母對孩子的價值觀有很大影響。

words.meaning: To give someone facts or information
words.example: Please inform me of any changes.

chinese.example: 請告知我任何變更。

words.meaning: To firmly fix or establish in a person
words.example: These habits are deeply ingrained in our culture.

chinese.example: 這些習慣在我們的文化中根深蒂固。

words.meaning: To receive something from someone after they have died
words.example: She inherited the house from her grandmother.

chinese.example: 她從祖母那裡繼承了這棟房子。

words.meaning: To begin or start something
words.example: The company initiated a new training program.

chinese.example: 公司啟動了一個新的培訓計劃。

words.meaning: To introduce something, especially a liquid, into something else
words.example: Doctors injected the vaccine into his arm.

chinese.example: 醫生將疫苗注射到他的手臂中。

words.meaning: To harm or damage someone physically
words.example: He injured his leg while playing football.

chinese.example: 他踢足球時傷了腿。

words.meaning: To embed pieces of a different material into a surface for decoration
words.example: The craftsman inlaid the table with mother-of-pearl.

chinese.example: 工匠在桌子上鑲嵌了珍珠母。

words.meaning: To enter data or information into a computer or system
words.example: Please input your password to log in.

chinese.example: 請輸入您的密碼以登入。

words.meaning: To ask for information
words.example: He inquired about the train times.

chinese.example: 他詢問了火車時刻。

words.meaning: To write or carve words on something
words.example: His name was inscribed on the trophy.

chinese.example: 他的名字被刻在獎盃上。

words.meaning: To put something into something else
words.example: Please insert your card into the machine.

chinese.example: 請將您的卡插入機器中。

words.meaning: To place or set something in a space or surface
words.example: They inset a map into the book’s cover.

chinese.example: 他們把地圖嵌入書本封面中。

words.meaning: To demand something forcefully
words.example: She insisted on paying for the meal.

chinese.example: 她堅持要付飯錢。

words.meaning: To motivate or encourage someone to act or feel something
words.example: The story inspired her to write a book.

chinese.example: 這個故事啟發她寫了一本書。

words.meaning: To set up equipment or software for use
words.example: They installed new computers in the lab.

chinese.example: 他們在實驗室安裝了新電腦。

words.meaning: To teach or guide someone on how to do something
words.example: The coach instructed the team on new tactics.

chinese.example: 教練指導球隊使用新戰術。

words.meaning: To speak or treat with disrespect
words.example: He insulted her by ignoring her opinion.

chinese.example: 他無視她的意見，侮辱了她。

words.meaning: To combine things so they become a whole
words.example: The company integrated new technology into its system.

chinese.example: 公司將新技術整合進其系統中。

words.meaning: To become stronger or more intense
words.example: The storm intensified overnight.

chinese.example: 暴風雨在夜間加劇了。

words.meaning: To communicate or work together
words.example: Students interact with their teachers in class.

chinese.example: 學生在課堂上與老師互動。

words.meaning: To connect with each other
words.example: The two systems are interconnected.

chinese.example: 這兩個系統是互相連接的。

words.meaning: To alternate between two scenes in a film or video
words.example: The documentary intercuts interviews with historical footage.

chinese.example: 這部紀錄片將訪談與歷史影像交叉剪接。

words.meaning: To prevent something from happening smoothly
words.example: Don't interfere with their conversation.

chinese.example: 不要干涉他們的談話。

words.meaning: To explain or understand the meaning of something
words.example: Students are asked to interpret the poem.

chinese.example: 學生被要求解釋這首詩的意思。

words.meaning: To be connected to each other
words.example: The two subjects interrelate closely.

chinese.example: 這兩個科目密切相關。

words.meaning: To stop someone from speaking by saying or doing something
words.example: Sorry to interrupt, but I have a question.

chinese.example: 抱歉打斷一下，我有個問題。

words.meaning: To become involved in a situation to improve or prevent something
words.example: The teacher intervened to stop the argument.

chinese.example: 老師介入以阻止爭吵。

words.meaning: To twist or mix things together in a combined way
words.example: Their cultures are interwoven through generations.

chinese.example: 他們的文化世代交織在一起。

words.meaning: To make someone known by name to another in person
words.example: Let me introduce you to my friend.

chinese.example: 讓我介紹你認識我的朋友。

words.meaning: To make something not valid or legally acceptable
words.example: The contract was invalidated by the court.

chinese.example: 合同被法院判定無效。

words.meaning: To create something that has never existed before
words.example: He invented a new kind of engine.

chinese.example: 他發明了一種新型引擎。

words.meaning: To put money or effort into something to achieve a result
words.example: She invested a lot of time in her studies.

chinese.example: 她在學業上投入了很多時間。

words.meaning: To examine or look into something carefully
words.example: The police are investigating the crime.

chinese.example: 警方正在調查這起犯罪。

words.meaning: To make someone feel more lively or energetic
words.example: A good night's sleep invigorates the body.

chinese.example: 良好的睡眠使身體充滿活力。

words.meaning: To ask someone to go somewhere or do something
words.example: She invited me to her birthday party.

chinese.example: 她邀請我參加她的生日派對。

words.meaning: To include someone or something in an activity or situation
words.example: The project involves students from different schools.

chinese.example: 這個項目涉及來自不同學校的學生。

words.meaning: To press clothes with a heated iron to remove wrinkles
words.example: She ironed her shirt before the interview.

chinese.example: 她在面試前熨燙了襯衫。

words.meaning: To separate something or someone from others
words.example: The patient was isolated to prevent infection.

chinese.example: 為了防止感染，病人被隔離了。

words.meaning: To officially give out or distribute something
words.example: The school issued new textbooks to students.

chinese.example: 學校向學生發放了新課本。

words.meaning: To list things separately
words.example: Please itemize all your expenses for the trip.

chinese.example: 請將你旅行的所有開銷逐項列出。
